ISSUE.TITLE: Feature: Disable the screensaver
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Is it possible to disable the Matrix screensaver?

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat(gui): add option to disable screensaver Added enable/disable checkbox option under Themes settings closes #171 Signed-off-by: Pranav C Balan <pranavxc@gmail.com>
